text:
Green screen is a
popular effect on TikTok.

It allows you to put any
background behind you.
To use it, open the app
and click the plus sign
at the bottom of the screen.

Tap "Effects" to the left
of the red record button.
Tap "Green Screen."
Upload your background image
by pressing the plus sign
and select your photo or video.
You can also pick from TikTok's library.
You'll be superimposed
onto the video or photo you've selected.
You can adjust yourself in the video

by expanding, shrinking,
or moving your image.
If you're recording yourself,
you can use the timer feature
to select the length of your clip

and give yourself three or
10 seconds to get ready.
If someone is recording you,

they can just hold down
the red button to record.
When you finish with one section,
you can pick another background

or repeat the process until
you're done with your video.
Now you're ready to post.
